issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement pretty print for physical query plan
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9482](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9482). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement pretty print for physical query plan. similar to what we have for the logical plan.
